System requirements:

Operating system: Windows XP (32-Bit), Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8
Processor: Core 2 Duo / Phenom X3 8750 2.6 GHz
Memory: 2 GB
Video: 512 MB, Geforce 8800 GT / Radeon HD4850, DirectX 9.0c
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX  9.0
Free space on hard disk: 9.1 GB

Description:

Transformers: Rise Of The Dark Spark connects universes Cybertron Transformers 
series and movies directed by Michael Bay (Michael Bay). The project will be 40 
playable characters. You have to hunt for a powerful artifact Dark Spark. 
During the passage of a single campaign for the Autobots or Decepticons you 
can switch between the characters. Transformers: Rise Of The Dark Spark will 
offer dynamic battle in large-scale co-op mode konfliktah.Budet present 
escalation (Escalation) for 4 people. It is necessary to withstand the 
waves of enemies. It added more improved protection and characters. 
In Transformers: Rise Of The Dark Spark has a single development system 
for multiplayer and single player. As you progress you will unlock new 
characters, weapons, special abilities and bonuses.

Features:

More than 40 characters from two different universes!

powerful enemies!
The new system rewards: Levels can also be obtained in the campaign and 
escalations, allowing the player to receive the award, which will help 
in the passage of all modes!
